description: Try our easy to follow Tumeric Pork Mince Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tumeric Pork Mince Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine kale, coconut flakes, jalape√±o, lime juice and 1 tsp salt flakes in a bowl. Using your hands, massage until kale softens. Set aside.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Add seeds, remaining salt flakes and black pepper. Cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until seeds pop. Add mince and cook for 1 minute, using a wooden spoon to break up lumps, then cook without stirring for a further 3 minutes or until par-cooked.

Add turmeric, onion, garlic and ginger and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently, or until onion softens. Stir in coconut cream and 1 1/2 cups water. Bring to the boil and cook for 10 minutes, adding beans in the last 2 minutes of cooking.
Meanwhile, prepare rice and quinoa following packet instructions. Top rice mix with curry and kale salad, and serve with extra coconut and lime wedges.
